item.title: What is Digital Humanities
item.description: Digital Humanities as per my understanding… In the early 2000s with explosive development in Communications Technologies and the digital Revolution emerged a new discipline Digital Humanities. In DH, digital Technologies intersect with Humanities in the most interesting ways. This approach has new relevance in the context of the covid-19 that has probably dealt a knockout blow to the traditional approaches in education. Today, students have to break free from the tyranny of the printed text and move confidently into the fluid dynamics of interdisciplinarity.
